sources.title: 3 Day Weekend | Full Movie | Survival Thriller | Maya Stojan
sources.description:
3 Day Weekend - Deep in the woods, Ben stumbles upon Shan bound in the trunk of a car and  before he can free her, his 3 Day Weekend turns into a complex mystery, left unresolved until the last shot of the film.
2019.  Stars: Morgan Krantz, Scott MacDonald, Nathan Phillips

metadata.Plot: An amateur camper stumbles across a kidnapping gone wrong, a jailhouse rendezvous, a double-cross, or a revenge plot, depending on which desperate character is misinterpreting the story - a puzzle thrill-ride told with no dialogue.
metadata.Actors: Morgan Krantz, Scott MacDonald, Nathan Phillips
